Text:
[RIPPER'S NOTE]
Suggested Codec Pack: CCCP(Disable FFDShow's H.264 Decoder & Select "CoreAVC") 
---http://www.cccp-project.net/
Suggested H.264 Decoder: CoreAVC 
--- http://www.demonoid.ph/files/details/2731965/8612385/
Suggested Media Player: Media Player Classic Home Cinema(Comes with CCCP) 
--- http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/

Question, is this really higher visible quality than 720p and is this completely uncompressed or something? Daman's 720p are 177mb and this 1080p is 1.66gb. Sorry I don't know very much about bitrates/compression.

SecTPB-
Thank you so much for the 1080p rip!  Keep up the great work!

Xuvial-
An uncompressed rip would be at least twice this size.  If you have a 1080p display, the visual difference is obvious.  If you have a 720p display, then just download SecTPB's 720p release instead.  Any HD rip of this show that's around 700MB and higher will look real nice on a larger screen.  The super compressed rips, like Daman's, that are less than 200MB, look fine on a very small screen like a 13" laptop.

Cheers :)
as usual the quality is amazing, thanks
I can attest that Daman's vids look great on a 27" 720p screen as well.
actually an uncompressed Rip would have 100X this size for 30mins
